servinfo.title: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Removal and Installation:For Petrol Engine Model

servinfo.ptxt: Check accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main and sub) output voltage as following steps.

s1.ptxt: For accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main), arrange 3 new 1.5 V batteries (1) in series (check that total voltage is 4.7 – 5.0 V) and connect its positive terminal to “Vin 1” terminal (2) and negative terminal to “Ground 1” terminal (3) of sensor. Then using voltmeter, connect positive terminal to “Vout 1” terminal (4) of sensor and negative terminal to battery.

For accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub), arrange 3 new 1.5 V batteries (1) in series (check that total voltage is 4.7 – 5.0 V) and connect its positive terminal to “Vin 2” terminal (2) and negative terminal to “Ground 2” terminal (3) of sensor. Then using voltmeter, connect positive terminal to “Vout 2” terminal (4) of sensor and negative terminal to battery.
Measure output voltage variation while accelerator pedal is no depressed and fully depressed as following specification.

servinfo.ptxt: If sensor voltage is out of specified value or does not vary linearly as the following graph, replace accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly.

spec.title: Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor output voltage
spec.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (main) output voltage [A]: 0.82 – 3.50 V, varying according to depressed extent of accelerator pedal
Accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor (sub) output voltage [B]: 0.44 – 1.74 V, varying according to depressed extent of accelerator pedal

entry.ptxt: Fully depressed position of accelerator pedal
